General.Name: Taiwan Shin Kong Security Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Shin Kong Security Co., Ltd. provides e-protection, cash escort, resident guard, and other services in Taiwan and internationally. The company engages in the designing, selling, leasing, installation, maintenance, repair, and inspection of fire and burglary prevention, and fire protection apparatus; and import and export of related products, as well as operation and investment of the relevant business. It also provides emergency notification, equipment monitoring, parking lot row, video surveillance, e-security, smart green building labeling consulting, GPS anti-theft, and anti-snatch and fleet management system services; and safety management, and access control and attendance systems. In addition, the company offers cash delivery, security, mind care and health care, and long-term care services; and video monitoring systems; automatic external defibrillators; POS systems; AI intelligent image security systems; and hotel counter escrow systems. Further, it leases and sells electronic locks for home, shop, office, factory, warehouse, etc. Taiwan Shin Kong Security Co., Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
